# Attendance: 

```{r q1_attendance}
q1_attendance <- q1_data %>%
    select(13:16,19:20) %>% #take columns of interest
    mutate("total" = unexcused + excused) #calculated column  to get total absences

head(q1_attendance) #check work

```



# Behavior

```{r q1_behavior}
q1_behavior <- q1_data %>%
    select(13:16, 21:22) %>% #take columns of interest
    mutate("total"= in_school + out_school) #calculate total 
    
head(q1_behavior) #check work
```

# Expelled

```{r q1_expelled}
q1_expelled <- q1_data %>%

head(q1_expelled)
```



# Reading



```{r q1_reading}
q1_reading <- q1_data %>%
    gather("reading_course", "Grade",26:32) %>% #gather reading columns and put them in row
    select(7,13:16,52:53) #select reading columns

dim(q1_reading)

q1_reading <-na.omit(q1_reading) #get rid of cases with no data

#mq1Reading <-na.omit(mq1Reading)


dim(q1_reading)

q1_reading

```



```{r q1_freereading}
q1_freereading <- q1_data %>%
    select(7,13:16, 33:34) #select free enter
    
q1_freereading <- q1_freereading[,c(1,2,3,4,5,7,6)] #re-arrange columns to make them align with q1 readind df

q1_freereading <- q1_freereading %>%
    rename("reading_course" = free_reading2) %>% #rename to match q1_reading
    rename("Grade" = free_reading1) #rename to match q1_reading
    

dim(q1_freereading)
q1_freereading <- na.omit(q1_freereading) #clean up to find cases with data
dim(q1_freereading)

q1_freereading




```

```{r q1_reading_bind}

q1_reading <- rbind(q1_reading, q1_freereading) #bind main q1_reading and free text

dim(q1_reading)

```

# Language Arts

```{r q1_langarts}
q1_langarts <- q1_data %>% 
    gather("langarts_course", "grade", 37:53,56:57)%>% #put lang arts classes in rows
    select(10, 13:16, 40:41) #select lang arts courses and grades

q1_langarts <- na.omit(q1_langarts) #get rid of cases with no entry

q1_langarts
```

```{r}
q1_freelang <- q1_data %>%
    select(10, 13:16,54:55) #find free entry lang cases

names(q1_freelang)

q1_freelang <- q1_freelang %>%
    rename("langarts_course" = free_lang2) %>% #rename columns to match reg lang courses

q1_freelang
```
